original_text: But now I tell you this, Job: You are not right! God is greater than any human. But now I tell you this, Job: You are not right! God is greater than any human. But now I tell you this, Job: You are not right!
korean_text: 내가 그대에게 대답하리라 이 말에 그대가 의롭지 못하니 하나님은 사람보다 크심이니라

sentences.original_text: But now I tell you this, Job:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 내가 너 욥에게 말하노니

sentences.original_text: God is greater than any human.
But now I tell you this, Job:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 내가 너 욥에게 말하노니

sentences.original_text: God is greater than any human.
But now I tell you this, Job:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 내가 너 욥에게 말하노니
